name: Play Linux
short_description:
Play Linux is a linux distro based on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS made for gamers.

It combines the power of Linux with the simplicity of Ubuntu.

You don't need to dual-boot anymore!

LibreOffice is a complete and easy-to-use office suite that is compatible with the most types of documents that comes installed by default on Play Linux

You can play games with Steam, a multi-platform gaming social network. Built-in Steam coming soon.

Play Linux comes with Firefox, a poweful and stable browser that does not spy you!

Play Linux comes with Skype, a VOIP service that allows you to chat with your friends.

Play Linux comes with Spotify, a powerful music streamer with more than 20 million songs. It also comes with Banshee, a music player.

Play Linux comes with WINE, Winetricks and PlayOnLinux, a set of tools that allows you to install and execute many Windows programs.
summary: Play Linux is an ubuntu-based distribution for gaming.
